profileText: a Representative from Texas; born in Houston, Harris County, Tex., May 4, 1989; graduated from Strake Jesuit College Preparatory, Houston, Tex., 2007; B.A., University of Virginia, Charlottesville, Va., 2011; nonprofit policy director; member of the Austin, Tex., city council, 2015-2022; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
